2.title: Mega Man 11: Chain Blast Only
2.plot: Nico and Fellon get into fights. Radman wants to become a speedrunner of 11. Tom thinks he's hot stuff.

1.title: Mega Man, Inverted Controls
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Mega Man 2, Quick Boomerangs Only
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Mega Man 6, Jet Adapter Only
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Mega Man 2, Moonwalk
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Mega Man 6, Power Adapter Only
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Super Mario Bros, Every Enemy Throws Hammers
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Chip & Dale, Dead Weight
7.plot: Dale has turned into a vegetable and the Snupsters must carry him through all the levels in the NES version of the Rescue Rangers. Stage E proves to be the biggest challenge when the guys try their best to get Dale through the level alive. Nico gives the others some good advice, but will it bite him in the ass? Fellon has trouble flicking switches, Candybars Game Overs on the first stage and Altima thinks you kill babies in the game. Can the game be done with these deranged rules?

8.title: Super Mario Bros. 3, Frog Suit Only
8.plot: The boys slide into their frog suits in an attempt to complete Mario 3 with a sick rule: Don't lose the frog suit. Watch as the Snupsters and their guest Kitsune go for game completion during SSS '15!

9.title: Mega Man 10, Killer Weapons Only
9.plot: Screw Crusher, Screwdriver, what's the difference to Shikaroxen? The boys have gone through the DLC to get the killer weapons so they can shove a stick up their ass once again on the Deranged series. They are not allowed to use anything else but the three killer weapons throughout Mega Man 10. Can you really run out of the Screw Crusher?

10.title: Mega Man Wily Rush
10.plot: The Snupsters got a recommendation through their website. It states that they have to race all the levels from the classic Mega Man series, but only the levels following the robot master stages. The sick rule is that they are only allowed to use the buster. Watch as the challenge breaks the boys as this was the last thing that was raced in day one of the summer stream.

1.title: Mega Man, Pacifist
1.plot: Candybars gets promoted to a full-time Snupster. The boys try going through Mega Man stages without shooting a thing. Nico's stage picks are questionable. Who wins the special Olympics this time around?

2.title: Mega Man 2, Metal Blades Only
2.plot: The Snupsters go on to prove that metal blades aren't the best weapon in the game. The boys are joined with lady_smaell. Lady tells Altima and his "marathon strats" to take a hike. Candy starts hating his life. Nico rushes through the levels, but at what cost? Fellon joins the race by surprise.

3.title: TaleSpin, No Shop
3.plot: The crew is clueless that there is a shop in TaleSpin, so they go through the entire game with only one bullet on the screen at a time with no upgrades. The episode gives a deranged idea to Fellon. Rest of the boys argue what kind of a plane Baloo is using.

4.title: Mega Man, Ice Physics + Rolling Cutter Only
4.plot: What is it like to race Mega Man with ice physics? Pretty easy. Now, add the rolling cutter only -rule and you're playing with power! The men discover one Emilio Estevez sleeping under Altima's covers. Guts Man learns the stun-lock. Fire Man shows the boys what it takes to beat him.

5.title: Mega Man, Hyper Bombs Only
5.plot: Lady Smaell joins Snupster and right as she settles in, the others make her take part in what might be the hardest Deranged challenge yet. The Snupsters try and see if you can beat Mega Man with Hyper Bombs only. Nico tries to kill Bomb Man by singing. Lady meets her new nemesis. Altima and Candybars can't get over the challenge and how ridiculous it is.

6.title: Super Mario World, No Cape
6.plot: Fellon fixes the bullshit counter and alters its circuits to create a whole new device for Altima to use. Mojoric appears a guest star on the show and enlightens the others about lemons. Does Kitsune get stuck on 1-1, or did he hire Fellon's old pal, Kyung-sook to do the dirty work?

7.title: Mega Man 3, Hard Knuckle Only
7.plot: The Snupsters accept a viewer request to do Hard Knuckles Only. Nico breaks the TV and the Skip Intro buttons. Doc Wood & Air prove that they are superior, once again. Candy spreads his hatred of Mega Man 3 while Fellon and Altima claim that Mega Man 3 is indeed the hardest game to do Deranged on.

8.title: Mega Man 3, Spark Shock Only with MegaPhilX
8.plot: The creator of Mega Man Unlimited, MegaPhilX joins the show. The cast finds a worse weapon than the Hyper Bomb. Spark Shock. In addition to not dealing damage to enemies, almost every enemy in the game is immune to its freeze effect.

9.title: Mega Man 4, Rush Marine Only
9.plot: How to turn ladybugs into flying nightmares? Rush Marine Only. The crew is perplexed by the shooting mechanics. Nico gives Altima a reality check by questioning his keyboard tray. Lady plays Mega Man 4 for the third time ever, but she still knows something about the game that the others don't. Or so she thinks. The Snupsters are joined by Mojoric who begs to have his trademark, "the death counter" in the episode.

10.title: Mega Man, Silly Spray Mode
10.plot: The crew puts in a code that transforms the buster into a short ranged shotgun. Shikaroxen claims that Nico is a cartoon character. Fellon gets another taste of the footholders because Altima prevents the use of Magnet Beam.

1.title: Mega Man 4, Normal Shots Are Charged
1.plot: The boys tweak Mega Man's arm cannon to always shoot charged shots. The Blue Yeti seemingly records neighbors having sex when listening the tape back. Candybars gets a new chance to beat the robot masters before someone beats the game. Nico realizes how the game genie code works after half an hour. Altima and Fellon think Nico is the dumbest person on board.

2.title: Mega Man Unlimited, 1-Shot Wave Buster Mod with MegaPhilX
2.plot: MegaPhilX mods his game for the Snupsters. Phil creates the ultimate barf bag: The curve shot, familiar from games like Festers Quest and 1-Shot limit known from TaleSpin are mixed together to create the ultimate mod.

3.title: Mega Man 3, Gemini Laser Only
3.plot: The highly requested challenge is here! Mega Man 3 steps in for the last time in a few months in the form of Gemini Laser Only. How bad is it?

4.title: Battletoads
4.plot: What? It's Battletoads, you want special rules on top you maniac? If you enjoy watching Turbo Tunnel for 2 hours, you're in the right place!

5.title: Mega Man, Improved Hyper Bombs Only
5.plot: The Snupsters are sent a code that makes the Hyper Bombs better. Does this allow them to beat the game with it? Nico brings Rick Astley over from his personal channel. Fellon has a fight with Bubble Boss. Candy shows Nico how to deal with Elec Man. Lady gets another chance at the footholders.

6.title: Crash Bandicoot 2, No Spin
6.plot: Fellon takes on another game he has never touched. The crew disables the spin and hilarity ensues. Can you beat the game without the its' core mechanic? Nico disposes of his lives on Bee-Having. Fellon experiments with the red and green boxes. Altima and Shikaroxen try to Bee-Have.

8.title: Mega Man 5, Beat Only
8.plot: Beat is one of the most powerful weapons in the game and it can easily shred through every enemy and boss. Right? The Snupsters prove once again, that no matter how easy the challenge is, there is always something that makes the episode an hour longer.

9.title: Blind DOOM Escort
9.plot: Altima is blindfolded, but he is the only one who possesses the colored keycards. The brutes, Nico and shikaroxen empty the maps while the coordinator Kitsune tells Altima where to go.Things go awry when the crew dies apart from Nico, who has no idea where to go. Can Nico lead Altima through the rest of the map?

10.title: Weapon Rotation, Mega Man 4
10.plot: With the new policies hitting YouTube, the crew tries to obey the new rules, making this the first (and last) ever 'PG' episode. Every time the boys take damage, they need to switch to the next weapon. Nico wants to prove that the weapons in Mega Man 4 are not trash. Altima finds something new about Flash Stopper. Candy still hates the game. Is Shika still the most profane member?

1.title: Mr. Perfect Race, Mega Man 10
1.plot: The Easy Mode on Mega Man 10 provides to be nothing but "Easy". Suggested by Bellringgames, the boys see who can get the most stages done Mr. Perfect style, which means no damage and only using the game's save feature.

2.title: Twin Stick Challenge, Mega Man 5
2.plot: The usual controls are taken out and replaced by analog sticks. The crew can only use the two analogs in their controllers for all the actions in the game. The episode gets overbooked resulting in a 5-man race.

3.title: Slash Claw Only, Mega Man 1
3.plot: Who knew you can equip the Slash Claw on the original Mega Man? Or that it glitches the hell out?

4.title: Slash Claw Only, Mega Man 7
4.plot: Finally, a true melee mode! Right?

5.title: Top Spin Only, Mega Man 3
5.plot: Finally, a real melee mode! What is this, Groundhog Day?

6.title: Inferior Weapons Roulette, Mega Man 5
6.plot: Water Wave, Napalm Bomb, Power Stone and Charge Kick. Which is the worst weapon? The boys randomize who gets which weapon and then tell stories about their journey as they race.

7.title: Superior Weapons Roulette, Mega Man 5
7.plot: We took a look at the worst, now let's take a look at the "best". Who are we kidding, it's Mega Man 5.

8.title: Super Arrow Only, Mega Man 5
8.plot: The Snupsters Game Over on Mega Man 5. How is this possible?

9.title: Moonwalk, Mega Man Unlimited
9.plot: Altima soft-locks the game, Nico refuses to share his E-Tanks with him, MegaPhilX fails at his own game and Fellon finds more glitches.

10.title: Mega Man 4 Weapon Roulette
10.plot: We are joined by a guest, Tom Lyman, an enthusiastic Snupster% runner. He makes up a challenge and randomizes himself the best weapon. Wait a minute..

1.title: Jet Speed, Mega Man 4
1.plot: Radman The Lucario comes in as a guest star and invents a new curse word. Nico finds a code so evil it makes everyone go "Holy $h#t!". MegaPhilX walks away from the mic while Altima turns into a mouse.

2.title: Mega Man 2, Upside Down
2.plot: When flipping the screen upside down is "not that bad" something tells us that the Snupsters have gone insane. Does flipping your screen reverse the controls too? Yes and no.

3.title: Castlevania, Inverted Controls
3.plot: The boys debate if Castlevania 64 is a good game or not and if Castlevania 3 is better than the original. Altima claims that he has never played the series. The others think he is lying as usual. Challenge acquired via Patreon by WingAscendant.

4.title: Thunder Wool Only, Mega Man 10
4.plot: Nico challenges the others to freestyle rap. Phil changes his opinion about Sheep Man. Altima's internet is on its death bed. Fellon gets fired. Again.

5.title: Forced Weapon Rotation
5.plot: Candybars plays the Weapon God and names the weapons the racers can use. He can switch on the fly, to whatever he wants. Watch as Nico, Shikaroxen and Fellon curse Candybars to the deepest hell.

6.title: Atomic Fire Only, Mega Man 2
6.plot: Gator Gator pledges to the Lady Smaell tier on our Patreon and makes us race with the Atomic Fire. Nico accuses Fellon of being a flat-earth believer. Altima opens up his secret past of playing Minecraft. MegaPhilX tells us some E3 buzzwords.

7.title: Concrete Shot Only, Mega Man 9
7.plot: Deranged goes to a short hiatus with this longer episode. The boys didn't predict how difficult it would be to beat Mega Man 9 with C.Shot only, but can they pull it off?

8.title: Blizzard Attack Only, Mega Man 6
8.plot: As Summer Stream gets canceled, Deranged is back. Watch how the crew goes ahead and tries to kill things with snowflakes. Nico doesn't fold his clothes, but how about the others? Altima tells hospital stories. Phil and Shikaroxen get into arguments about being French.

9.title: Crash Bomber Only, Mega Man 2
9.plot: The boys wake up Lady to do an episode. Nuff said.

10.title: Wire Adapter Only, Mega Man 4
10.plot: Radman joins the crew again. Altima tells the story of having an entire sports team in his mouth. Nico reminds everyone about the "The Day You Will Die" website.

1.title: Blindfolded DOOM Escort EPISODE 2
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Jet Speed Mega Man 3
2.plot: The boys didn't take the spike drop into account. Altima "thows" stuff around. Nico and Phil have an accent, but what does that have to do with anything?

3.title: Item-1 Only, Mega Man 2
3.plot: Altima and Nico have three of the biggest fights in Snupster yet. Fellon and Radman are being handled by Lightning Lords.

4.title: Mega Man 6 Weapon Roulette
4.plot: You asked for Plant Barrier and Silver Tomahawk, we added Wind Storm and Knight Crush. Let the games begin.

5.title: Mega Man 3, Moonwalk
5.plot: Nico explains the situation in Ecuador. Altima is technically first. Tom continues to imitate Tourettes Guy. Fellon is perplexed by the weird effects the hack causes.

6.title: Mega Man 7, Wild Coil Only
6.plot: MegaPhilX comes up with an idea and his footage conveniently crashes. Something else happens too, but it's not nearly as exciting as the thought of using Wild Coil for almost 2 hours.

7.title: Mega Man 2, Time Stopper Only
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

8.title: Mega Man, Super Arm Only
8.plot: Lady has breathing problems. Wily spawns Spikes in this Gator suggested run. Nico gets mauled by Copy Robot. Candy and Radman give Nico a run for his money.

9.title: Mega Man X, Shotgun Ice Only (Snupsmas Edition)
9.plot: Merry Snupsmas. Nico sucks at editing. Radman, Phil and Altima have an actual race. MegaPhilX smokes 50 tobaccos.

10.title: Super Mario Bros. 3, Fireballs Break Everything
10.plot: Kitsune kills himself in the Toad House. Nico skips entire stages by breaking walls. Tom finds out that breaking blocks in World 2 spawns Munchers. Zargon is back again for some reason.

1.title: Mega Man 4, Balloon Adapter Only
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Mega Man, Magnet Beam Only
2.plot: Radman gets to practice bustering Elec Man. Nico has another name for the Magnet Beam. Tom has a Hot Pocket waiting at the finish line while Altima manages to glitch the game after it's already over.

3.title: Mega Man 2, Forced Weapon Rotation
3.plot: Nico takes the role of Weapon God. Tom crashes the game. Altima gets himself in trouble. Radman and Candybars test how good of a bomb the Crash Bomb really is.

4.title: Mega Man 5: Lights Out
4.plot: Audio problems arise as The Snupster figure out that Mumble is down. Nico flips the light switch. Fellon has the ultimate strategy, or does he? Altima goes to Star Man first. Radman says he's beat the game once before.

5.title: Super Mario Bros. 2, Bouncy Gravity
5.plot: Gravity goes down the crapper. Enemies fly all about while Nico, Altima, Candy and Phil try their best to advance. Nico wonders what it takes to create a deformed starbaby. Can Altima and Candybars hold their laughter in this time? MegaPhilX probably practiced.

6.title: Mega Man 10, Rebound Striker Only
6.plot: Shikaroxen forgot to record. Altima gives geometry lessons. Nico expresses his hatred towards Mega Man 10 while Tom races the game for the first time with us.

7.title: Mega Man 3, Forced Weapon Rotation
7.plot: Fellon becomes a god and tells everyone to kill themselves. Nico tries the game of being quiet for the first time. Tom finds out nobody likes him. Shikaroxen talks about pleasing Gods. Altima is not here, but will Radman secure 3rd?

8.title: Mega Man 4, Pharaoh Shot Moonwalk
8.plot: Well, they made it, despite Tom's directions. They call it Mega Man 4, even though the title screen clearly says Mega Man IV. The Snupsters moonwalk while only wielding the Pharaoh Shot; Isometric exercise. Care to join them? Prepare for an unforgettable racing.

9.title: Mega Man 9, Plug Ball Only
9.plot: Nico burns Mega Man 9 on his monitor. Phil has a minor setback with Splash Woman. Tom explains how he saw a tumbleweed of pubes. Altima went to school, he says.

10.title: Mega Man 7, Danger Wrap Only
10.plot: Fellon makes jokes. Tom questions Nico about his favorite game. Radman stopped playing Mega Man after Mega Man 4.

1.title: Mega Man 3: Search Snake Only
1.plot: Fellon is confused what KFC stands for. Tom records from inside a barrel. Are Altima and Radman really the same person?

2.title: Mega Man 5: Charge Kick Moonwalk
2.plot: Tom makes a costly mistake. Altima fantasizes about Snarf. Phil believes that Star Man uses plastic stars while Nico complains about everything, as usual.

3.title: Mega Man 8: Flame Sword Only
3.plot: Tom and Nico relive The Grapist. Fellon doesn't beat the game fast enough. Radman's hard drive says he gotta record again.

4.title: Mega Man 9: Proto Man Only
4.plot: Pledged by Dar Uniya. Altima has an alternative name for a popular speedrunning event. Shikaroxen is here for some reason. Nico and Tom showcase their lack of skill with Proto Man.

5.title: Super Mario Land: Hard Mode
5.plot: Some say there are more enemies, some say nobody will watch this. All we know it's not Sidetracked.

6.title: Super Mario Bros 3: No Touch Challenge
6.plot: Everyone gets disqualified, but why? Find out and eh, this sounds pretentious. Just think of a good description instead of this one.

9.title: Mega Man 1: Shooting Hurts
9.plot: Every time you fire the buster, you lose health. Lady is back to deal with Mega Man 1. Nico and Altima, well, let's just say that boys will be boys. MegaPhilX has a personal problem with one of the Robot Masters.

imdb.title: Snupsters Race Deranged
plot: A group specializing in racing Mega Man on the Nintendo Entertainment System start to race retro games, applying twisted, unexpected rules in an effort to make them step out of their comfort zone.
